    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>cahi1:data_110948</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Relative speeds of stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Relative Geschwindigkeiten der Sterne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les vitesses relatives de tient le premier rôle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Velocidades relativas das estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Velocità relative delle stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχετικές ταχύτητες των αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Velocidades relativas de estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the relative speeds of stars moving away from Earth and moving towards the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Doppler shift</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">galaxies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die relativen 
Geschwindigkeiten der Sterne, die weg von der Masse bewegen und in 
Richtung zur Masse bewegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre les vitesses relatives de 
tient le premier rôle éloigner de la terre et se déplacer vers la terre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra as velocidades relativas 
das estrelas que movem-se afastado da terra e que movem-se para a 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra le velocità relative 
delle stelle che si muovono via dalla terra e che si muovono verso la 
terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί τις σχετικές ταχύτητες των
αστεριών που απομακρύνονται από τη γη και που κινούνται προς τη 
γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra las velocidades relativas 
de las estrellas que se mueven lejos desde la tierra y que se mueven 
hacia la tierra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Doppler Schicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
